item.description:
Successful. Confident. President of a company. Owner of a professional practice. Media celebrity. Self-employed professional. Sports professional.
Doctors, lawyers, business owners, corporate presidents, senior-level management and administrators and consultants from various fields are some of the members of this very, very select group of single CEOâ€™s.
As a member, on the first Tuesday of every month, you will be invited to an early evening cocktail party or dinner in the Greater Boston area.
SINGLE PROFESSIONALS have requested a venue where that can meet and socialize with others at their level of stature for business and romance.
Attractive men and women who've reach a level of success and independence but who'd like to share their precious spare time with someone special. Our purpose is to provide a place for you to meet.
However, even though this is a public event, each person must submit a profile and make a reservation in advance. No admittance to anyone who doesn't have a reservation.
Go to www.singleceos.com for all the info.
item.name: THE SINGLE CEO'S CLUB
